sentences.sContent: One of the bullets passed through Andrea's chest before embedding itself in a wall.
sentences.sCn: 其中一颗子弹穿过安德烈亚的胸膛然后嵌入一面墙中。

synos.tran: 栽种；使嵌入，使插入；使深留脑中

phrases.pCn: 嵌入水印；嵌入水印滤镜

remMethod.val: em(进入…中) + bed(床) → 把…嵌入床中 → 嵌入

trans.tranOther: to put something firmly and deeply into something else, or to be put into something in this way
